help-file.title: "FROST BEACON"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <room> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Generic
"Frost Beacon" is a spell that creates a block of ice that is mentally linked with the caster, thereby notifying the caster of the presence of a mob or player that has tread on the ice block.
